h2_title: Where to Find the Apramana Bat
h3_title: Apramana Bat Miniboss Fight and Guide
content: After the fight is over and you complete Chapter 3, you'll find that the Apramana Bat Spirit has been automatically entered into your inventory!
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Apramana_Bat.md', within the main section titled 'Apramana Bat', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find the Apramana Bat' and the sub-subsection 'Apramana Bat Miniboss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
After the fight is over and you complete Chapter 3, you'll find that the Apramana Bat Spirit has been automatically entered into your inventory!
